alert.note: Alert for Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:44PM EDT until May 21 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ORLEANS AND NORTHWESTERN ESSEX COUNTIES... At 644 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Norton, Averill, Warren Gore, Warners Grant, Averys Gore, Holland, Morgan, Lemington, Lewis, Derby, Canaan, Charleston, Morgan Center and West Charleston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
